EmailCard.title: Forgot password?
EmailCard.description: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll email you a link to reset your password

SentCard.description: A link to reset your password has been sent to

UsersSetPassword.title: Update password
UsersSetPassword.description: Must include at least one symbol or number and have at least 8 characters.
UsersSetPassword.tokenHasExpired: Your password reset token has expired, would you like to request another one?
